original: gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am //
analyzed: gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am //
translated: Whatever there is in this world system,🔽and whatever there is in all the world systems in the ten directions,

original: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /

original: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sngas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa @188a * //
analyzed: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sngas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa @188a * //
translated: I offer them to all the bodhisattvas and the five families of bodhisattvas who dwell in all the world systems in the ten directions,

original: thams cad dang snying po dang phyag rgyas dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad dang snying po dang phyag rgyas dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
translated: to all the special deities of secret mantra and awareness mantra, with the essence mantras, the mudras, and the secret mantras.

original: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta h'a sya l'a sya ra ti kr'i da soo khya aa nutat ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta h'a sya l'a sya ra ti kr'i da soo khya aa nutat ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: bzhad pa'i phyag rgya de nyid rdo rje thal mo bskor ba 'di spyi bor bzhag la //

original: yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /🔽gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am //🔽gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na dpag bsam gyi shing ngam //

translated: Again, having joined the palms hollow, one should say this:🔽“Whatever wish-fulfilling trees or🔽cloth trees there are in this world system or in all the world systems of the ten directions,

original: gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste /

original: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to perform the activity of offering to all the tathāgatas without exception,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang // snying po dang // phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang // snying po dang // phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bo dhi aa langk'a ra bastra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bo dhi aa langk'a ra bastra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, adornment of the unsurpassed bodhi tree, homage to the great cloud of offerings.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /

original: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran par byas la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran par byas la /
translated: Having recalled the suffering of saṃsāra of all sentient beings,

original: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed de //
analyzed: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed de //
translated: one should generate the mind of enlightenment through the power of compassion in order to liberate all sentient beings.🔽For the sake of liberating those not liberated,🔽for the sake of releasing those not released,🔽for the sake of comforting those not comforted,

original: ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang / ma grol ba rnams dang dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang / ma grol ba rnams dang dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
translated: for the sake of passing beyond sorrow those not beyond sorrow,

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: I will generate the mind of enlightenment in order to perfectly liberate all realms of sentient beings from the ocean of cyclic existence.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dham tsitta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dham tsitta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um //
translated: Oṃ. I offer the mind of enlightenment to all the tathāgatas.

original: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Form the mudra of the goddess of charm and say this:

original: sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig //

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzrod bha ba d'a na p'a ra @188b mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um //

analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //

analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: tri tri shi kho ti bi su p'aksha sv'a h'a /

translated: One should sit facing the wind direction, make a fist with the right hand, erect the middle finger, and bend the index finger at the first joint, like a spike. One should also do the same with the left hand, place it on the hip, and stimulate with the thumb.

original: ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
translated: This is the summoning seal of Vāyu.

original: de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
translated: From that very [mudrā], placing the thumb as before is the pledge seal of Vāyu.

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bo brkyang pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bo brkyang pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
translated: The mudrā for summoning is the same as the mudrā for summoning, except that the thumbs are extended.

analyzed: sngags ni aom sva sam kha khu khu kha sv'a h'a //

original: ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du ldog ste /
analyzed: ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du ldog ste /

analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs nas brkyang la de'i rgyal tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste //
translated: Cross the two little fingers and extend them. Place the two ring fingers on top of them, each one separate. Bend the two middle fingers like a vajra.

original: g-yabs pa ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: g-yabs pa ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
translated: Waving this is the mudrā for summoning Kubera.

original: phyag rgya de nyid las gud mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de nyid las gud mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
translated: The pledge mudrā of Kubera is the same as that mudrā, except that the two middle fingers are placed inside in the manner of a vajra bond.

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya 'o //
translated: The mudrā for dismissing is the same as the mudrā for summoning, except that the two middle fingers are extended.

original: sngags ni aom ku be ra ye sv'a h'a //
analyzed: sngags ni aom ku be ra ye sv'a h'a //
translated: The mantra is: “Oṃ, Kubera, svāhā!”

translated: Facing the northeast, one should sit with one's hands joined in añjali, with the ring fingers and little fingers folded in and crossed, the two middle fingers placed together and erect, and the two index fingers placed side by side like a vajra.

original: / mthe bo gnyis rab tu gzhibs te bzhag la de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun sen mo sprad nas nang du g-yabs pa ni dbang ldan gyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //

translated: The thumbs are placed together, and the two index fingers touch at the fingernails and are waved around. This is the seal of summoning Agni.

analyzed: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], the index fingers are placed in the manner of a vajra as before. This is the pledge seal of Agni.

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni lar gtang pa'i phyag rgya //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni lar gtang pa'i phyag rgya //
translated: Extending the index finger from the summoning seal is the seal of dismissal.

original: sngags ni aom dzum dzum sh'i ba sv'a h'a //
analyzed: sngags ni aom dzum dzum sh'i ba sv'a h'a //
translated: The mantra is oṃ juṃ juṃ śivāya svāhā.

original: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te /
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te /
translated: Standing with the left leg straight, one should join the palms of the hands, turn them upward,

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
translated: and with the two index fingers in the form of hooks, summon Brahmā and so forth.

original: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar @191a * //
analyzed: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar @191a * //
translated: From that very [mudra], the two index fingers are placed as before;

original: gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: this is the pledge seal.

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the summoning seal, extending the two index fingers is the seal of sending away.

original: sngags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: sngags ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mantra is:

original: aur dham brahma ne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aur dham brahma ne sv'a h'a /
translated: urdhvaṃ brahmaṇe svāhā

original: s'u ry'a gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: s'u ry'a gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
translated: sūryagrahadhipataye svāhā

original: tsandra ya na kasha tra aadhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: tsandra ya na kasha tra aadhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
translated: candra nakṣatrādhipataye svāhā

original: rkang pa na nyam par gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
analyzed: rkang pa na nyam par gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
translated: Standing with the left leg straight, one should join the two hands

original: sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar /
analyzed: sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar /
translated: and touch the fingertips together without space in between.

original: mthe bo zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te /
analyzed: mthe bo zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te /
translated: Making a circle with the thumbs, one should look downward.

original: sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra for inviting the earth goddess and so forth with the hook of the index finger is the mudra for inviting the deities below.

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the mudra for inviting, placing the index finger as before is the pledge mudra.

original: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Extending both index fingers is the mudra for sending away.🔽The mantra is:

original: sngags ni aa dhva pri thvi bhya: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni aa dhva pri thvi bhya: sv'a h'a /
translated: Adhvaprithvibhyaḥ svāhā.

original: aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
translated: Āsurébhyaḥ svāhā.

original: n'a ge bhya: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: n'a ge bhya: sv'a h'a /
translated: Nāgebhyaḥ svāhā.

original: de nas sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la /
analyzed: de nas sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la /
translated: Then, with that very mantra, offer argha and pādya to all.

original: las 'dis rang gi slob ma'i tshogs dang bdag la bgegs med par mdzod cig / dngos grub dam pa yang stsol cig ces byas nas thams cad slar gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: las 'dis rang gi slob ma'i tshogs dang bdag la bgegs med par mdzod cig / dngos grub dam pa yang stsol cig ces byas nas thams cad slar gtang bar bya'o //
translated: By this rite, please be free from obstacles for my assembly of disciples and myself, and also grant the highest spiritual power.🔽Then, send them all away.

original: yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /

original: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //🔽nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
analyzed: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul // nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //

analyzed: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: and those who have magical powers and dwell on the earth,

original: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor bcas pa la /
analyzed: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor bcas pa la /
translated: together with your retinues of wives, children, and servants,

original: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
analyzed: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
translated: I, kneeling on the ground,

original: thal mo sbyar te khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar te khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
translated: with palms joined, request you:🔽Come here from your abodes to receive the offerings.🔽Those beings who dwell on Mount Meru,🔽in Nandana and the abodes of the gods,🔽in the eastern and western mountains, in the abodes of the sun and moon,

original: gnas nas phan gdags slang du 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
analyzed: gnas nas phan gdags slang du 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
translated: and those who dwell on all the mountains,

original: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang // g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang // grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
analyzed: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang // g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang // grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
translated: In villages, cow pens, and empty towns,🔽In empty houses, temples, and shrines,

original: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang // gtsug lag khang @191b ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
analyzed: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang // gtsug lag khang @191b ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
translated: In monasteries, cities, or dwelling places,

original: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
analyzed: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
translated: In hermitages, elephant stables,🔽Those who dwell in the king's treasuries, at crossroads and intersections,

original: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang // gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung //
analyzed: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang // gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung //
translated: On highways and at the foot of solitary trees,

original: dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po dang // seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang // 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
analyzed: dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po dang // seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang // 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
translated: And those who dwell on Mount Meru and in charnel grounds,

original: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
analyzed: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
translated: Having become extremely pleased and delighted,🔽Garlands, flowers, incense, lamps,

original: phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba //
analyzed: phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba //
translated: Praise, bali offerings, and respectful offerings of ghee,

original: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
analyzed: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
translated: Having accepted these, drunk and smelled them,

original: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
analyzed: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
translated: May the fruits of these actions be accomplished.

original: ces bya bas so //
analyzed: ces bya bas so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de ltar gtor ma sbyin pa thams cad ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: de ltar gtor ma sbyin pa thams cad ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba'am /
translated: Thus, all bali offerings should be given with the yoga of noble Yamantaka,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bya'o //
translated: Or with the yoga of Vajra Humkara, and so forth.

original: de nas nye reg byas la lhag dang ma tshang ba'i cho ga'i nyes pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas nye reg byas la lhag dang ma tshang ba'i cho ga'i nyes pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, having performed the self-empowerment, in order to thoroughly pacify the faults of incomplete ritual procedures,

original: sbyan la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la /
analyzed: sbyan la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la /
translated: One should perform the pacifying fire sacrifice with the eyes, etc.

original: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ste /
translated: One should worship the mandala with the distinctions of the types of seals and replies of the seals.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of the vajra family is the seal.

original: las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
translated: The seal of the karma family is the reply of the seal.

original: rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of the jewel family is the seal.

original: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan te /
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan te /
translated: The seal of the lotus family is the reply of the seal.

original: shin tu byang bar bslabs pa'i slob ma dang / rang nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu byang bar bslabs pa'i slob ma dang / rang nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind them with a disciple who is well trained, and with oneself.

original: gal te dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag 'byor pa yod na dkyil 'khor las ha cang mi ring bar bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas shar du bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o //🔽lhor ni rin po che tog gi mdo /
analyzed: gal te dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag 'byor pa yod na dkyil 'khor las ha cang mi ring bar bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas shar du bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o // lhor ni rin po che tog gi mdo /
translated: If there is time on the day of entering the mandala, one should recite the Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitā not too far from the mandala, preceded by respect and service, in the east.🔽In the south, one should recite the Ratnaketu Sūtra.

original: nub tu sdong pos brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: nub tu sdong pos brgyan pa'o //
translated: In the west, one should recite the Sāla Sūtra.

original: byang du zla ba'i sgron ma'i mdo bklag par bya zhing /
analyzed: byang du zla ba'i sgron ma'i mdo bklag par bya zhing /
translated: In the north, one should recite the Candrapradīpa Sūtra.

original: phyi rol du gar byed du gzhug pa la sogs pa ltad mo pa rnams kyang phyogs bzhir byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: phyi rol du gar byed du gzhug pa la sogs pa ltad mo pa rnams kyang phyogs bzhir byed du gzhug go //
translated: One should also have the spectators perform dances and so forth in the four directions.

original: de nas lus khrus byas shing dris bsgos pa me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa gdong dri zhim pos byugs shing bdag nyid rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas mgo bo 'jam pa'i dbyangs @192a * //
analyzed: de nas lus khrus byas shing dris bsgos pa me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa gdong dri zhim pos byugs shing bdag nyid rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas mgo bo 'jam pa'i dbyangs @192a * //
translated: Then, having bathed the body, anointed it with perfume, adorned it with flower garlands, and anointed one’s own face with sweet-smelling substances, one should enter the maṇḍala, adorned with all ornaments, with the head ornament of Mañjughoṣa.

original: kyi phyag rgya'i mchog gis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba ni /
analyzed: kyi phyag rgya'i mchog gis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba ni /
translated: Taking up the flower garland with the supreme mudrā of Mañjughosha, one should enter the maṇḍala.

original: byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas nas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas nas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Having generated the mind of enlightenment, taken the vows, and so forth, one should enter.

analyzed: 'jug pa'i tshe slob ma la sogs pas 'di ltar glu blang ngo //

analyzed: aom pra bi sha bha ga b'an ma h'a su kha mo kasha bu ram /

analyzed: zhugs nas rol cing dga' ba dang // sgeg pas mgon la phyag bya'o // phyag byas nas ni dkyil 'khor der //

original: lan gsum bar du bskor bar bya //
analyzed: lan gsum bar du bskor bar bya //

original: ma h'a ra ta su ti dha su su to shya /
analyzed: ma h'a ra ta su ti dha su su to shya /

analyzed: de nas yang mdun du 'dug la de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod do //

original: rdo rje chen po rin che ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rin che ba //

analyzed: ye shas chen po las che ba //

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de dag grub //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de dag grub //

analyzed: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la /

analyzed: yi ge brgya pa brjod na babs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon bzang po phul la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /

analyzed: aom sarba buddha par ratna mam dza ya @197a * //

analyzed: aa bhi shi nytsa phra ba ra badzra dha ra shr'i badzra sa tva sa ma ya stvam aa ham /

analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor bas yon gyi mchog blangs la /

analyzed: slob dpon rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas ;

analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs padma bris la /

analyzed: slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i skur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la /

analyzed: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur bar bya'o //

analyzed: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri /

analyzed: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba dang / ji srid rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar du dbang bskur ro //

analyzed: de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i sku gzugs de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung la /

original: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satvam dza: h'um bam ho: su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur //

analyzed: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
translated: Then, holding the victorious vase with the vajra fist, one should confer empowerment:

original: aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ka stvam /
analyzed: aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ka stvam /

original: aa bhi shinytsa mi //
analyzed: aa bhi shinytsa mi //

original: sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam //🔽dri bho me bha pa siddhya na ma: te bha ga w'ana ma h'a badzra ha ra su ra ta stvam /
analyzed: sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam // dri bho me bha pa siddhya na ma: te bha ga w'ana ma h'a badzra ha ra su ra ta stvam /
translated: Sarva vajra adhipati sattva.🔽Dhribhome bhava siddhyanaṃ. Te bhagavān mahā vajra hara surata sattva.

original: ma h'a badzra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ma h'a badzra sv'a h'a /
translated: Mahā vajra svāhā.

original: aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi yang dag par mchod de sngags brjod par bya'o //🔽me tog ma'i gzugs can gyis me tog gis gtor la /
analyzed: aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi yang dag par mchod de sngags brjod par bya'o // me tog ma'i gzugs can gyis me tog gis gtor la /
translated: With Oṃ bhūr bhūvaḥ svaḥ, one should give the vajra in both hands, and with the offerings of outer, inner, and secret, one should make offerings and recite the mantra.

original: deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces pas mchod na khyod mchod pa'i yan lag brtsams kyis /
analyzed: deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces pas mchod na khyod mchod pa'i yan lag brtsams kyis /
translated: With the form of the flower goddess, one should scatter flowers and say, From now on, all buddhas and bodhisattvas... If one makes offerings, one should commence the branch of offerings.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan ba byed pa'i skur mthong bar @199a * //🔽'gyur ro zhes brjod do //🔽de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan ba byed pa'i skur mthong bar @199a * // 'gyur ro zhes brjod do // de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: One will see the form adorned with the major and minor marks of a great being.

original: gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la 'jug par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la 'jug par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, with the form of the incense goddess, one should burn incense and say, This will cause all tathāgatas to enter you, satisfying all sentient beings.

original: de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, having shown the lamp to the form of the lamp-lady, one should say this:

original: deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yang dag par 'bar bas //
analyzed: deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yang dag par 'bar bas //
translated: “From now on, like Vajradharma, you will be the eye of all the Tathagatas,

original: ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang bar byed par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang bar byed par 'gyur ro ;
translated: and you will illuminate with the light of wisdom the sentient beings who are covered by ignorance.”

original: / de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: / de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, having anointed with the unguent the form of the unguent-lady, one should say this:

original: deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “From now on, you will give the stream of the fragrance of morality, meditative stabilization, wisdom, and so forth to all the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and the world.”

original: de nas lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs can gyis me tog cig sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'phangs la 'di skad ces brjod do /
analyzed: de nas lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs can gyis me tog cig sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'phangs la 'di skad ces brjod do /
translated: Then, having tossed a flower with the form of the goddess Lāsyā, one should say this:

original: deng nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa thams cad 'dod pas mchod cing /
analyzed: deng nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa thams cad 'dod pas mchod cing /
translated: From now on, you should worship all the tathāgatas and bodhisattvas with desire.🔽And you should enjoy yourself with the unsurpassed joy, delight, and rapture of all the tathāgatas, by following the practice of mantra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i rol pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rol bar gyis shig / de nas lha mo phreng ba ma'i gzugs can gyis phreng ba bcings la 'di skad ces🔽brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i rol pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rol bar gyis shig / de nas lha mo phreng ba ma'i gzugs can gyis phreng ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, the goddess in the form of a garland should tie the garland and say this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng bas rgyun du mchod pa la skyo ba med par gyis shig 'di lta ste /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng bas rgyun du mchod pa la skyo ba med par gyis shig 'di lta ste / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba 'di ni /
translated: “All of you tathāgatas and bodhisattvas, without tiring, always worship with garlands all the tathāgatas.🔽This garland of all the tathāgatas

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng brgyan rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng brgyan rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin no //
translated: is the supreme ornament of all the tathāgatas.”

original: de nas lha mo glu ma'i gzugs can dang / aom badzra satva su sam gra ha ta ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / glu blangs la 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas lha mo glu ma'i gzugs can dang / aom badzra satva su sam gra ha ta ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / glu blangs la 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, in the form of a goddess who is a dancer, and with the song “Oṃ vajra-sattva, come here!” and so forth, one should sing and say this:

original: deng nas brtsams te chos thams cad sgrogs shid //
analyzed: deng nas brtsams te chos thams cad sgrogs shid //
translated: “From now on, proclaim all dharmas!

original: ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par @199b sdud pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par @199b sdud pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Before long, you will experience the gathering of all tathāgatas in all sentient beings.”

original: de nas lha mo gar mkhan ma'i gzugs kyi gar gyi lag pas sad par byas la 'di skad ces brjod de /
analyzed: de nas lha mo gar mkhan ma'i gzugs kyi gar gyi lag pas sad par byas la 'di skad ces brjod de /
translated: Then, with the gesture of dancing, awaken the goddess who is a dancer, and say this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar la rab tu 'jug cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gar gyi rjes su dgyes par gyis shig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar la rab tu 'jug cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gar gyi rjes su dgyes par gyis shig /
translated: “Enter into the dance of all tathāgatas, and delight in the dance of all tathāgatas!”

original: de nas rin po che'am gser gyi thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas rin po che'am gser gyi thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, holding a precious or golden scalpel, sitting in front [of the disciple], one should say this:

original: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
analyzed: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
translated: Just as the king of physicians

original: 'jig rten rab rib bsam ba ltar //
analyzed: 'jig rten rab rib bsam ba ltar //
translated: Just like the world’s cataracts,

original: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
analyzed: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
translated: Child, you have not understood

original: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
analyzed: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
translated: The cataracts removed by the Victorious Ones.

original: de nas mig tu pra bkod la me long blangs nas //
analyzed: de nas mig tu pra bkod la me long blangs nas //
translated: Then, place the praṇava in the eyes and take up the mirror.

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
translated: The characteristics of phenomena should be taught:

original: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
analyzed: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
translated: All phenomena are like reflections,

original: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
analyzed: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
translated: Pure, clear, and stainless,

original: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
analyzed: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
translated: Ungraspable and inexpressible,

original: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
analyzed: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
translated: Arising from causes and actions.

original: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
translated: Without essence, without abode,

original: de ltar chos rnams shes nas su //
analyzed: de ltar chos rnams shes nas su //
translated: Knowing phenomena in this way,

original: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
analyzed: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
translated: Practice for the benefit of sentient beings, unequaled.

original: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //🔽de nas ho: zhes bya bas gzhu byin la //
analyzed: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye // de nas ho: zhes bya bas gzhu byin la //
translated: Still, you will be born as a child of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod do //🔽phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phan du gzhug cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod do // phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phan du gzhug cing /
translated: Then, with the word “hoh,” give the bow and say, “Please delight all the tathāgatas.”

original: steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
translated: Aim the four arrows in the four directions and aim one each above and below.

original: de nas sha dha ban dzdza ka byin la 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul la nye bar longs spyod cing /
analyzed: de nas sha dha ban dzdza ka byin la 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul la nye bar longs spyod cing /
translated: Then, having given the śaḍgraha, he should say, “By this, you will emanate all powers and enjoyments and enjoy them.🔽And give them to others.”

original: gzhan dag la yang byin cig / de nas rgyal mtshan byin la 'dis ni dgra thams cad dang 'thab pa las nye bar rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang byin cig / de nas rgyal mtshan byin la 'dis ni dgra thams cad dang 'thab pa las nye bar rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
translated: Then, having given the banner, he should say, “By this, you will obtain victory over all enemies and strife.”

original: de nas rdo rje ste mas ma'i phyag rgya byin la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje ste mas ma'i phyag rgya byin la /
translated: Then, having given the vajra-mother seal,

original: 'dis ma rungs pa thams cad sgrubs shig ces brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ma rungs pa thams cad sgrubs shig ces brjod do //
translated: he should say, “By this, you will accomplish all the wicked ones.”

original: gzhan yang aa badzra satva zhes bya bas me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: gzhan yang aa badzra satva zhes bya bas me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: Moreover, having taken up the mirror with “A vajra satva,” he should say the following:

original: rdo rje sems ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje sems ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: “The nature of Vajrasattva

original: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
analyzed: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
translated: is pure, clear, and stainless.

original: bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas //
analyzed: bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas //
translated: Child, it abides in your heart

original: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin //
translated: and is the nature of all buddhas.”🔽And he should say the following:

original: zhes bya ba dang / 'di skad ces kyang bsgo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / 'di skad ces kyang bsgo ste /
translated: And he should be told:🔽

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kye sems rdo rje ni 'di nyid yin par rtogs shing /
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kye sems rdo rje ni 'di nyid yin par rtogs shing /
translated: This is the very one who is the lord of all the tathagatas, the bodhicitta vajra.

original: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing /🔽dung yang @200a * //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing / dung yang @200a * //
translated: Then, place the wheel of dharma between the two feet.🔽Also, give the conch

original: lag pa g-yas par byin te /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas par byin te /
translated: in the right hand.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod do /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod do /
translated: Together with the letters of the dharma of the wheel of dharma and speech, say this:🔽“From now on, just by generating the mind, turn the wheel of dharma.

original: ded nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
analyzed: ded nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
translated: From today onward, in the world,

original: skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor //
analyzed: skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor //
translated: turn the wheel of the protectors.

original: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
analyzed: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
translated: With the unsurpassed dharma conch,

original: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
analyzed: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
translated: fill everywhere without exception.

original: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
analyzed: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
translated: Do not be doubtful or uncertain

original: dogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
analyzed: dogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
translated: and, with a fearless attitude,

original: gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
analyzed: gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
translated: proclaim to this world the supreme method of mantra conduct.”

original: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
analyzed: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
translated: If that is done, the buddhas

original: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
analyzed: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
translated: And grateful for the benefit

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
translated: All of those vajra holders

original: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
analyzed: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
translated: Totally protect you.

original: rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
translated: Having praised with one's own one hundred and eight names,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas //
translated: Having shown the samaya mudra,🔽One should say this, In the three realms there is no sin

original: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //🔽khams gsum na ni sdig med de //

analyzed: spyan la sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //

analyzed: de nas zhi ba chen po bya'o //
translated: then one should perform the great pacification.

original: dad med dman la 'jug la min //
analyzed: dad med dman la 'jug la min //

analyzed: 'dod la chags dang khro bo'i dbang bskur dang // slob ma bu min blo gros dman rnams la //
translated: to those under the influence of attachment to desire or anger, or to those who are not the teacher's sons or of inferior intellect.

analyzed: cho ga'i bsgrub pa 'di ni sbyin mi bya //

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Thus did the Blessed One, the great vajra wisdom light, proclaim.

original: de nas dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob nas de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob nas de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Then, having received empowerment and permission, one should practice.🔽Having received empowerment and permission, one should bless the three or four periods of the day and night, and having received empowerment, one should perform the ritual up to taking the vajra of spiritual powers.

original: dbang skur zhing gnang ba thob pas dus mtshams gsum mam bzhir byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur nas dngos grub dang rdo rje blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su bcad pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par mngon sum bzhin bltas la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i srid mtshan ma mthong gi bar du tshig gzhan mi smra bar bklag
analyzed: dbang skur zhing gnang ba thob pas dus mtshams gsum mam bzhir byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur nas dngos grub dang rdo rje blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su bcad pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par mngon sum bzhin bltas la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i srid mtshan ma mthong gi bar du tshig gzhan mi smra bar bklag
translated: Having visualized the entire maṇḍala wheel as if directly perceived, one should recite the Praise in Verse without speaking any other words until one sees the signs of the deity.

original: par bya'o // de nas dpyid zla ra ba'i zla ba nya ba la dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor bris la der bzhugs te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: par bya'o // de nas dpyid zla ra ba'i zla ba nya ba la dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor bris la der bzhugs te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: Then, on the full moon of the first spring month, one should draw the gaṇḍī maṇḍala as explained in the sādhana and reside there, performing all the rituals,

original: skyil mo krung ma bshig par ji srid nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rje btsun 'jam dpal las 'od zer rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te /
analyzed: skyil mo krung ma bshig par ji srid nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rje btsun 'jam dpal las 'od zer rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te /
translated: Without breaking the cross-legged posture, as long as the sun has risen, one should recite the mantra until the light rays definitely emerge from Venerable Mañjuśrī and illuminate the maṇḍala,

original: sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nub par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nub par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: and disappear into the crown of the practitioner.

original: de'i 'og tu lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i skra zlum por 'khyil ba /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i skra zlum por 'khyil ba /
translated: After that, one will become like a sixteen-year-old with curly hair,

original: lus la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa @207b lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: lus la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa @207b lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis bzhugs pa /
translated: adorned with the thirty-two marks and the eighty minor marks, and wearing all divine ornaments.

original: rje btsun 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rje btsun 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become like Venerable Mañjuśrī.

original: gal te bag med pas de grub par ma gyur na /
analyzed: gal te bag med pas de grub par ma gyur na /
translated: If one does not succeed due to carelessness,

original: de tshe dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nya la dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas nas de bzhin du sgrub pa la zhugs na /
analyzed: de tshe dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nya la dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas nas de bzhin du sgrub pa la zhugs na /
translated: then in the month of Jyeṣṭha, having made the maṇḍala as before, if one enters into practice as before,

original: de ltar 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will enter in that way.

original: der yang ma grub na ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya ba la de bzhin du sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: der yang ma grub na ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya ba la de bzhin du sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: If it is not accomplished even then, one should engage in the practice in the same way on the full moon of the last autumn month.🔽In the seventh practice, even one who has committed the five acts of immediate retribution will be successful.

original: sgrub pa bdun pa la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: sgrub pa bdun pa la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has declared the Blessed One, the great Vairocana Tathāgata.

original: dngos grub mchog ni sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog ni sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
translated: The supreme power is that of the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and so forth.

original: dngos grub 'bring ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / bum pa bzang po dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub 'bring ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / bum pa bzang po dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The middling power is that of the wish-fulfilling gem, the excellent vase, the wish-fulfilling tree, the sword-vidyādhara, and so forth.

original: de dag kyang de la lhag par mos pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog cing de'i sgrub pa'i cho gas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang de la lhag par mos pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog cing de'i sgrub pa'i cho gas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting the Praises of the Names with devotion to them, one will accomplish them through the rite of their practice.

original: dngos grub tha ma ni gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / rgyas pa'i longs spyod dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams te //
analyzed: dngos grub tha ma ni gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / rgyas pa'i longs spyod dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams te //
translated: The lesser powers are the powers of killing, expelling, separating, enthralling, summoning, prosperity, swift-footedness, and so forth.

original: de dag kyang de dang de la mos pas bklags na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang de dang de la mos pas bklags na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And these are accomplished by reciting the mantra with devotion to this or that power.

original: dngos grub mchog sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis gal te dngos grub mchog ma grub kyang 'bring ngam tha ma 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis gal te dngos grub mchog ma grub kyang 'bring ngam tha ma 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are engaged in the practice of the supreme power will attain the middling or lesser powers if they do not attain the supreme power.

original: dngos grub 'bring sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang de ma grub kyang tha ma grub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dngos grub 'bring sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang de ma grub kyang tha ma grub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Those who are engaged in the practice of the middling power will attain the lesser power if they do not attain the middling power.

original: tha ma la sgrub par zhugs pa rnams kyi mchog dang 'bring ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha ma la sgrub par zhugs pa rnams kyi mchog dang 'bring ni ma yin no //
translated: But the supreme and middling powers are not for those engaged in the practice of the lesser power.

original: de bas dngos grub mchog gi phyir 'bad par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas dngos grub mchog gi phyir 'bad par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one should strive for the supreme power.

original: dngos grub 'bring dang tha ma rnams ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos grub 'bring dang tha ma rnams ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The middling and lesser powers will be attained without effort.

original: gsang sngags gzhan dag bsgrubs na mtshan gyi don gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi lha'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis bya ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags gzhan dag bsgrubs na mtshan gyi don gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi lha'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis bya ste /
translated: If you practice other secret mantra, you should do it by means of the yoga of the deity whose nature is the meaning of the name.

original: de bas ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na /🔽sngags dang phyag rgya'i lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyis sems cad thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de bas ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na / sngags dang phyag rgya'i lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyis sems cad thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, since you accomplish all feats by means of the reality of the mandala,

original: rje btsun 'jam dpal @208a * //🔽gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs ba yin no //
analyzed: rje btsun 'jam dpal @208a * // gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs ba yin no //
translated: the Lord of Secrets taught the Praise in order to take care of all sentient beings by means of the nature of all mantra and seal deities.

original: de bas na 'di ltar gang ci yang rung ba ma brtags pa dag la sngon dang phyi ma'i don brtag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ltar gang ci yang rung ba ma brtags pa dag la sngon dang phyi ma'i don brtag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to examine the meaning of the past and future with regard to whatever is not examined, the reality should be explained.

original: ji ltar na mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha rnams rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi nges par bstan pa bshad pa ni med kyi rang bzor brtags pa lta bur shes so zhe na 'di ltar bshad par bya
analyzed: ji ltar na mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha rnams rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi nges par bstan pa bshad pa ni med kyi rang bzor brtags pa lta bur shes so zhe na 'di ltar bshad par bya
translated: One may say: But in the Discourse on Chanting the Names, no explanation is given of the particular teachings on the arrangement of mandalas, mantras, seals and deities, so it is understood that it is a fabrication.

original: ste / thams cad ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid du gnas la de bzhin du bshad pa yin gyi rang bzor byas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ste / thams cad ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid du gnas la de bzhin du bshad pa yin gyi rang bzor byas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is explained as follows: Everything is contained in the Discourse on Chanting the Names and is explained in that way, but it is not a fabrication.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer 'gyed pa'i snang bas dngos po rnams shin tu gsal bar mngon yang /
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer 'gyed pa'i snang bas dngos po rnams shin tu gsal bar mngon yang /
translated: Although the light of the sun's radiating extremely bright rays illuminates things very clearly,

original: dmus long dang mig med pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dmus long dang mig med pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo //
translated: the blind and those without eyes do not see it.

original: de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i blo gros kyi mig ma tshang bas gal te rtsod dus zin kyang de'i tshe nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i blo gros kyi mig ma tshang bas gal te rtsod dus zin kyang de'i tshe nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, even if the time of strife has arrived, there is no fault if one's eyes of extremely clear intelligence are incomplete.

original: de lta mod kyi blo gros dman pa rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi blo gros dman pa rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste /
translated: Nevertheless, in order to make it understood by those of inferior intellect, it should be explained again.

original: sngags mchog mnga' bdag bdag rig sngags rgyal //
analyzed: sngags mchog mnga' bdag bdag rig sngags rgyal //
translated: The Lord of the Supreme Mantra, the King of the Self-Awareness Mantra,

original: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
translated: The King of Secret Mantras, the Accomplisher of Great Meaning,

original: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni //
analyzed: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni //
translated: The Great Uṣṇīṣa, the Wonderful Uṣṇīṣa, and so forth,

original: gtsug tor brgyad bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gtsug tor brgyad bshad pa yin no //
translated: Explain the eight uṣṇīṣas.

original: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
translated: The Lord of All Jewels, the Lord,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
translated: The Lord of All Lokeśvaras, the Master of All Vajra Holders,

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the Tathāgatas together with the retinue of Bodhisattvas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
translated: Vajrasattva, the Great Being,

original: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
translated: Vajrarāja, the Great Bliss,

original: zhes bya la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug rnams bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug rnams bstan pa yin no //
translated: And so forth, this teaches the sixteen Bodhisattvas.

original: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
analyzed: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
translated: The Great Holder, the Vajra Noose,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
translated: The great vajra hook and noose

original: zhes bya bas ni sgo srung rnams kyang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni sgo srung rnams kyang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This also mentions the gate guardians.

original: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
analyzed: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
translated: The great ones are the knowledge-mantra holders,

original: zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa bzhi bshad pa yin no //
